timerScreen.title: Next Bell
timerScreen.tagLine: You next class start in 25mins.  The pack will remind you when it is time for you to pay attention
timerScreen.androidReactotronHint: If this doesn't work, ensure the Reactotron desktop app is running, run adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 from your terminal, and reload the app.
timerScreen.iosReactotronHint: If this doesn't work, ensure the Reactotron desktop app is running and reload app.
